description.value:
>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.hIhgdXnqGHBm0A64]{Envoy Improvisation}

@Icon[type:mind-affecting] @Icon[type:sense-dependent]

As a move action, you can grant a single move action to an ally within 60 feet. The ally can use that move action during her next turn to @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#reload]{reload} or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.rules.JournalEntry.U37n5tY5hn1ctzQL.JournalEntryPage.SKgwxeMd2gB1g2W8#draw-or-sheathe-a-weapon]{draw a weapon}. As part of the move action to activate this ability, you can also reload or draw a weapon. If the ally is adjacent to you, she can draw weapons and use ammunition you are carrying as though she were carrying them herself. The ally can use her extra move action in between her other actions, as well as before or after a full action. A character can use no more than one bonus action from coordinated reload or similar abilities (such as the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.uHbvuQynNpYq97Vt]{quick quaff} and @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.Item.GVqy1BqtYojohT9x]{hurry} envoy improvisations) in a single round.
